title: Join the Ogre Kingdoms | Total War: WARHAMMER III Early Adopter Bonus Reveal
author: Total War
description:
CRUSH! STOMP! GORGE! The Great Maw's hungry! 🍖  Get yer appetites ready because the Ogre Kingdoms are 'ere and they're ready to feast. Join 'em in WARHAMMER III launching on 17/02/22
Pre-install with Game Pass for PC or Purchase: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9NGGB0GZPB9D
Buy it on the Microsoft Store: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9mwc735wd9ck
Pre-purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142710/Total_War_WARHAMMER_III/
Pre-purchase on Epic: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/total-war-warhammer-3
Any questions? Check out the updated FAQ: https://www.totalwar.com/blog/total-war-warhammer-iii-faq/

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
